mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (board_num, board_title, board_content, board_post_date, board_mod_date, board_view_num, notice_check, mem_num, board_type_num) VALUES ((SELECT NULLIF(MAX(A.board_num), 0) + 1 FROM board A), #{board_title}, #{board_content}, sysdate, sysdate, 0, 'N', #{mem_num}, 1)
